<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 6"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Loyal Warhorse](/Feats.aspx?ID=228) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Champion" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=24" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 112 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
[divine ally (steed)](/Classes.aspx?ID=4)

</column>

---

You and your mount have grown closer, and your loyalty to each other is unbreakable. The mount you gained through the divine ally class feature is now a [mature animal companion](/Rules.aspx?ID=155). In addition, your mount never attacks you, even if it is magically compelled to do so.

<title level="2">Loyal Warhorse leads to...</title>
[Imposing Destrier](/Feats.aspx?ID=238)
name: Loyal Warhorse
